post.body: you are so right! :)
your whole family is a little crazy.. :) you better learn to deal..
funny.. :) she's a teenager.. enough said..
can we hope not... ;)
awesome.. thank you.. :)
THANK YOU!
http://twitpic.com/ys7g - Woo Hoo! Congrats!
I want to know how to make one... tell me please!!
that is sooooo awesome.. what a picture.. great way to start the new year huh?? :)
so sorry. but it was SO great seeing you. You must remember that I am old and set in my ways and will probably fall asleep before 12
never mind.. just found scott's number
someone call me.. I don't know where @scottmurray lives..
not taking classes this semester.. needed a break..
i will!! :) just let me know when...
I am going to try to be.. :)
thanks for the offer but I think i will be joining the Hatchers.. :) have fun.. :)
what time??
huge fireworks show from my front porch = great way to start the new year. .. thank you Homeland Park fire department!
home.. going to put on my pj's and watch the ball drop from the comfort of my couch.. am I old or what???
http://twitpic.com/yh9m - Fire at @cryshat Fun fun
